title: Cant use league
body: First off i'm a brand new player to league downloaded the game yesterday, started the game and everything was fine and running. I shut off my computer and microsoft had an update, now i try to start league up and now the PvP.net Patcher no longer wants to work. Not sure if its windows or if my game is bugged. (already uninstalled and redownloaded and if anyone is curious i have windows 10)

replies.body: If I'm correct, you're missing a piece of the error in that this is a Kernal Patcher error.  if that's the case then the update may have changed your PC security settings and blocking the patcher from launching.  Go over the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to fix it up.  Let me know if you have any questions, and welcome to League!

i get patch update error today then i decide nothing better to do than install this auto update and go watch tv after win10 patch was done everything start work just fine so its prob win10 problem try start in some compatibility mode maybe that will do
